item.title: The book is real, and more
item.description:
First on the agenda, the book is real.
As you can see above, my three complimentary copies showed up in the mail today. Word from the Dread Pirate himself (i.e. Lead Author/Tech Reviewer) is the books should be en route, if not already arriving at book stores all over the place. After all, the guy in Canada got his. ðŸ˜‰ â€“ â€“ â€“ â€“ â€“ Next, a Smiles update.

item.title: First, the other stuff

Iâ€™m nearly ready to start talking about the new project too, but as the title suggests, Iâ€™ll be talking about the other stuff today. First thing on the agenda, Ludum Dare. I wanted to follow up that prior post of mine with a brief finale post.
